course_title: Topics in Afr American Studies: Black Radical Thought
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 15 / Seats Avail: 2Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes: This course explores the history, theories, voices and strategies African Americans have and continue to employ in the fight for Black liberation.
course_description: This course explores one of a wide range of topics pertaining to the African American experience in the fields of human and civil rights, social and literary texts, and the social sciences.
sections: Class Nbr: 3070, Section #: 7, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 10-11:15a, Instructor: G. Gray, Status: Open
